NameOfOurTeamMember: In the image above we have a picture of Jamie who is one of valued team members
bio: Jamie is a first-year Computer Science student currently studying at UEA. He had some experience coding in HTML before coming to UEA but has since learned much more and is excited to continue learning. Jamie has a personal interest in helping the enviroment so this project was perfect for him.
whatTheyDo: Jamie's role is the developer of the team's page as well as some of the CSS used for all pages and of course the CSS for his page. Jamie was also tasked with setting up the trello which was used to plan the project. All of the contents of the teams page is dynamically loaded by the use of Java Script and json.
Contributions: Jamie uses HTML , CSS , JavaScript and json in the page he made.
